name: Kirby's Adventures In Lavloand
description:
Arrow keys to move around and while in the beggining cutscene you press buttons to reveal the skip button and press it to play the game if you already saw the cutcene its a short game because I only had a few weeks to finish it and the story might not make sense so I will say it more clearly: One day Kirby is happy and is not expecting anything bad to happen but something bad does happen and that is Galacta Knight stole Kirby's limbs and now he wishes to get them back so he goes to this new castle that appeared and goes through many levels and fights Galacta Knight and eventually gets his limbs back.

Credits:

This was for a game jam so credit goes to @thecoolestcat93

also, logo looks bad because I was rushed

(But no worries this wasnt meant to be that good of a game)
